drupalNodeEvent.title: Chinese in America: From Finance, Filmmaking to Philanthropy

field_description.processed: Join us for a webinar on December 1st, Tuesday, from 12-1pm Eastern as Peng and Jenny discuss their personal experiences as Chinese students in America; how they came to make Finding Yingying; the importance of telling and humanizing stories like Yingyingâ€™s in the current geopolitical moment; and the many contributions that Chinese populations continue to make to this American life.
